Reviews.Title: Still a Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Matthias Lindemann
Reviews.Content: Great Phone.  And even though it is 3 Generations "behind" compared to the now new iPhone 5, it is still a marvelous phone and worth every penny.  iOS 6 runs very well, giving you all the benefits of iCloud.  GREAT PHONE!!!

Reviews.Title: Used "Good" Iphone is fine
Reviews.Author: L. Schrader
Reviews.Content: I bought a used "good" from Warehouse Deals, phone works great and was in fine condition.  It does not come with a sim card but the ATT store provided a free one.  One bonus is when I brought in my own equipment, they did not insist on a contract change, a good thing since I have an old unlimited data plan. Activation was easy, but the whole process took a bit of time.  If you encounter a difficult sales agent, I would say to try another agent, this did not happen, but it could have.3Gs is an excellent phone, I like it better then my old 3G.  32gb is a nice amount of space, with bells and whistles

Reviews.Title: Save your money...get a new one
Reviews.Author: Andy Son "hackback"
Reviews.Content: Ordered a 32GB model, they sent a 16GB in a clearly mis-marked box. Although they did credit me for the difference, no one was ever able to get the phone to work with the sim card from my 32GB 3GS phone, and so this was returned for a full credit. Only wasted about two days of my time.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This was supposed to be an unlocked phone but it turned out to be tied to AT&T; network. Software had been updated to 5.1 which made it more difficult to unlock. I spent additional $50.00 to revert back to version 4.1 then unlock before getting it to work. The good news is, once I got it working, everything worked perfectly. Shame on you Amazon.

Reviews.Title: disappointing . BEWARE
Reviews.Author: Denis Piel
Reviews.Content: the product looked perfect.. well packaged and looked in good condition. BUT it was bought as UNLOCKED but it WAS not at least it was not for European USE . Maybe it was unlocked for USA use but when i buy an unlocked phone i expect it to be totally unlocked. It cost me an extra 40 euors per phone to get it unlocked in Europe. NOT SATISFACTORY. i guess i could have sent it back but once i had used it in the US i had already uploaded lots of stuff and not wanting to redo and rebuy i kept it. BUT BEWARE when buying phone that claims to be unlocked.

Reviews.Title: Won't keep charged.
Reviews.Author: Karen G.
Reviews.Content: This phone was great until after using it for about 5 minutes (if your lucky) it keeps powering off. Why? Well apparently it won't charge up and what little charge it does charge, you will be cut off fast. I tried other charging devices to get it to charge. A different cable, etc. No luck. I've let it charge for 2 days and no luick. Same problem. Surely after all my bad luck with buying two different iPhones Amazon Warehouse will give me back my money. I will update that later.

Reviews.Title: Looks like a steal because it would not work.
Reviews.Author: Haley
Reviews.Content: It was not unlocked when it arrived, the overall condition of the phone was fine. But I am unable to use it with my ATT sim card that I have.

Reviews.Title: Unlocked iPhone 3GS
Reviews.Author: Defoots
Reviews.Content: I loved the product. I have no complaints on that score. However both were supposed to be unlocked, only one was, matter amicably resolved.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: david
Reviews.Content: it work perfectly it came as it was described, it has everything i need the only thing is that the box had a little dent but other than that it was just perfect

Reviews.Title: NOT unlocked
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: Ordered as Christmas gift...UNLOCKED GSM Phone...what did I get?  A LOCKED phone.  Not fun for the person who got it.  Not fun for me.

Reviews.Title: Stoked with my iPhone!
Reviews.Author: James C.
Reviews.Content: I purchased it as "used- good condition", through Amazon. When it arrived it was complete with all of the factory Apple accessories AND looked to be in new condition to me. I slipped in my SIM card, did the phone set up with WI-FI and presto, it was up and running. I'm very pleased with the purchase and the actual transaction too.

Reviews.Title: Sent wrong item
Reviews.Author: Calvin H.
Reviews.Content: Unlike the other reviews, I knew I was getting an AT&T; iPhone (nowhere does it say that the phone is unlocked).  I got the phone overnight delivered to me and was extremely excited to open it when I got off work.  I got it, opened it, things were new and in very great condition, you would've though it w,as new.  But me having owned multiple iPhone's, iPod's, and iPad's (plus jailbroken and unlocked them professionally) I instantly checked one thing first.  I flipped it on the back to not only make sure it was a 3GS (it's 3GS when the apple logo and below lettering is all shiny and chrome) but to make sure it was the right amount of GB's.  To my dismay I received a 16GB model.  Even though I got the 3GS that I was planning on working on, it wasn't the one I was expecting to receive or pay the extra $17 to have it delivered so quickly.  You would think if you pay for overnight they'd at least make sure they're giving you the right order.  I'm now extremely upset for two reasons.  1st, Since it's not an Amazon item, I can't just send it in and get it replaced with the correct one & 2nd, I will now have to wait a possible 2 weeks just to get my money refunded when I paid them $17 for 1 day (it'll probably take an entire 4 days just to get to Indiana and I'm in Chicago, which is ridiculous, and then they'll take forever to process my refund).  I already went to Newegg to re-order the phone, hopefully they don't mess it up as well.

Reviews.Title: DOA
Reviews.Author: Jose Javier Puerto
Reviews.Content: Unbelievable: I purchased a "like new"  Iphone 3GS 32GB and instead I got a dud. The phone was scratched all over and the SIM tray is missing. The phone is dead and won't eve start. It also rattles inside when you shake it and is lighter than the other two "like new" phones I ordered. I'm currently in Spain so there is no way for me to return this. BTW the phone came in an actual zip bag like the ones they use to collect evidence in CSI! The first time in 5 years I get ripped off by Amazon but there you have it: There is a first time for everything!

Reviews.Title: Of no use
Reviews.Author: vikash
Reviews.Content: Did not like came as very old.Charger was not working. I had to return but return was smooth. It was not good exp.

Reviews.Title: Took a chance
Reviews.Author: Sabrina
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product as an alternative for paying INSANE prices with Apple and the carriers. When I received this phone it was in pretty good condition considering how old it was. The ports were fine, the screen had only minor scratches on the black part of the screen, part of the plastic backing had a crack most likely from being dropped. Other then that Ive been using it for over 6 months now no problem. It was however EXTREMELY dirty. So much so that the dock port looked like it had been stuffed with cookie dough. It was so caked in the small crevice that the plug when I went to charge it, didn't sit flush like it should have. A little cleaning was all that was needed. I did eventually take it to be unlocked and that was successful since it was an AT&T; phone. If I ever need to buy another iPhone I would most definitly come here to Amazon where the price is unbeatable for what I'm getting.

Reviews.Title: Meh... fine for what I got it for.
Reviews.Author: Aimee
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone specifically to give to my eight year old son to keep him off of mine and downloading all the games. So the phone will serve its purpose. Although I am unhappy with the fact that there is an enormous crack going across the back of the phone. I've gotten a case to go over it but that really would have changed my decision had I known it would be damaged.

Reviews.Title: Not Refurbished to my standerd for a iPhone 3GS at $90. Wasted my money
Reviews.Author: david hodges
Reviews.Content: was stated as refurbushed,back cover looked like it had been around for years. To me refurbished would mean that it should look like it is new. Not like i replaced the led screen. and speeker.Refubushed is suppose to mean it looks and operates like a new one. If you are going to sell a iphone 3gs at that price!!!!!!!!!!!!!A lost of my money Straight up.if

Reviews.Title: Iphone was in very good condition when i received it.
Reviews.Author: JBJ "John"
Reviews.Content: Reason I like this iphone 3gs 32gb it has lots of memory to store pictures and video.And upon using this phone everything works as soon as I start using it.I gave it a four star because I receive this phone on time and in good condition.Thanks for the good service. Really appreciate it.

Reviews.Title: Pre-Owned iPhone 3GS 32 GB - EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: Roy R.
Reviews.Content: used phone, formerly used via AT&T...my; pre-owned phone arrived in great condition, all as stated in descriptions.  Quickly "up and running" ... and  there is AN APP for that!  Thank you

Reviews.Title: I like it, but this Iphone is locked by pin number
Reviews.Author: Jeanny cc
Reviews.Content: I bought First one same iPhone in Amazon house last time. it was very new and fast to go to internet. just battery only work one day.now , I help my friend to order Second one same iPhone again at this store, the phone looks very new! but I found it was locked by pin number.  I really did not know how to unlock pin number. I required return. they game me return label very fast.. why this phone has pin number?I hope seller can check phone when you sell.I order Third One in this store again! I hope it will work well like the First One!.

Reviews.Title: DON'T Purchase!!! read first...
Reviews.Author: Hcastillo
Reviews.Content: I ordered this item because it's described as a 32GB device. The order arrived and to my surprise it was an 8GB iPhone. Amazon doesn't provide a free replacement and for some unknown reason there's "no way" they could verify and avoid a similar scenario. So if you don't like surprises and then making calls to see if you could get what you ordered. Avoid this purchase... Good luck out there...

Reviews.Title: Bad product
Reviews.Author: Maurizio Di Pasquale
Reviews.Content: I got mine and instead to be 32GB it was 8GB but the funny thing is that there was an AT&T; sim card inside !!!!!!!Returned the same day I got it.

Reviews.Title: Was listed as Unlocked
Reviews.Author: Bill MacDonald
Reviews.Content: I searched "Unlocked iPhone 3GS 36mgs. This was the first item to pop up I ordered... then on my receipt was the first mention of AT&T; and now I have a paperweight. Amazon went from being a good seller to a yard sale reseller. Never again!

Reviews.Title: Check what you recieve closely
Reviews.Author: Big Dubaya
Reviews.Content: I ordered and paid for an iPhone 3gs 32GB.  However, to my surprise after some checking since the back cover had been changed to a generic one that does not state the memory size, I found that I had actually been shipped an 8GB 3gs.  Needless to say, I was not happy, and quickly returned it for a refund.  Big waste of my time.

Reviews.Title: i got the wrong item or incorrect item
Reviews.Author: srikanth padipally
Reviews.Content: I ordered 3 GS 32gb iphone when the package was opened i found 1 gen 8 GB iphone. i have drive to ups store now

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Varallo
Reviews.Content: I choose this because it is true this is an awesome product I would recommend this to a friend defently

Reviews.Title: iPhone 3GS 32GB
Reviews.Author: heather almeida
Reviews.Content: I ordered the IPhone 3GS it came exactly as described if not better! I had it within a week, totally satisfied customer! Thanks Again!

Reviews.Title: It works, its in good condition, there is a small crack on the screen, Its an iphone 3gs
Reviews.Author: Samuel
Reviews.Content: The phone works. It is in pretty good condition, there is a small crack on the screen but noting damaging the use of the device. THe main problem i had with it is its an iPhone 3. It cant get the new update and new games.

Reviews.Title: Still a good phone
Reviews.Author: D. McGee "book lover"
Reviews.Content: Despite the hype about the latest version of the Iphone, the 3gs is still a good phone for older adults like me, who are maybe not so tech savvy and aren't interested in a lot of the apps.  I don't have to squint to see the screen and the keyboard is nicely sized.  I also bought this iphone for my 86year old dad and he really likes it and uses it every day.

Reviews.Title: They sent a 16 GB phone
Reviews.Author: Kevin Cannan
Reviews.Content: I would have been stoked to have a 32GB phone, however I'm unemployed with no phone if they do the whole we'll give you your money back thing.  Any other item and I would have, however I work on call and losing work because of having no phone would be worse.

Reviews.Title: wow
Reviews.Author: Vince
Reviews.Content: great phone its not a iphone 5 but im still in the gss just what i wanted make sure you get it here

Reviews.Title: Runs 6.1.3 like a champ
Reviews.Author: L.Gildart
Reviews.Content: If you don't need SIRI or 4G data, this is still a great phone. Also, if you're an AT&T; customer, and your contract period has expired, you can get them to unlock this phone so that you can use it with any gsm service provider. My husband is using his with T-Mobile prepaid and gets unlimited everything for $50 a month. This allows him to check his email, maps, and calendar for his business whenever he needs to from wherever he needs to.I have an iPhone 4 running the same iOS, and, honestly, except for the camera, this phone is very much a comparable performer.

Reviews.Title: Shame on you amazon!!!
Reviews.Author: Frontliner
Reviews.Content: Searched for unlocked iPhone and this was one of the items that came up. Purchased it and it arrived locked to AT&T.; Tried to unlock it and it had the latest software so that it was not possible to unlock it yet.ended up paying to downgrade it to an unlock able version and then paying again to unlock it . Such pain and hassle!! Advice is, be sure of what you are buying before paying for it.Amazon should have taken time to look at what they are listing before actually categorising it because that is really confusing to buyers. That is why I say , shame on you amazon !!!

Reviews.Title: Looked brand new!!!
Reviews.Author: C.W. "C.W."
Reviews.Content: Order arrived early and TRULY unlocked.  I'm having no problems with it and it was a great deal! The condition of the Iphone exceeded my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Worst product ever
Reviews.Author: Mohammed Sindi
Reviews.Content: When I first bought it, I was really happy that I were able to find Iphone 3GS, because I thought that the market ran out of itBut then, when it arrive, well... I spend the same cost of each Iphone just to repair itThe 1st one was unchargeable, the touch screen wasn't working, and the mictophone didn't work well. I had to change the screen, the touch, the battery, and the microphoneThe 2nd was a big failure; the touch wasn't working, neither the wifi nor the network were working, and I wasn't able at all to update it for some reasonIf there was a reason to make me stop purchasing anything from Amazon anymore, it must be that they're untrustable!!Wellaway Amazon.

Reviews.Title: so you sell me a bad iphone 3gs
Reviews.Author: allyuh
Reviews.Content: after i pay my money you give me not working phone that cut off this will not play out good for you and justice will be served

Reviews.Title: Not a good working iphone Very dissapointted,
Reviews.Author: NELSON
Reviews.Content: Got what I thought was a great deal on a iphone from the warehouse deals, turns out this was a bad desesion on my part. its true if it seems to good to be true it usually is. the pakaging was great the phone seemed in good condition all looked ok. used a H20 sim card which is under ATT and the iphone is for ATT and I . keep getting no service so I called H20 C.C. center and they ask me for the IEMI number. ok did that, recycle the phone update the software and still no service so called H20 back several times to see if its on there end they stated that all looks good on there end, put the sim card back in the old phone and it work fine. I feel the amazom knew that thiis was no good and still tried to sell this particular product. really not happy with the time wasted on this. I am sending this back for a refund. by the way this is an Iphone 3gs. seened all reviews and gimics on how to make the phone work. just not a good working Phone.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: fernando
Reviews.Content: phone fully functional in all respects with the only detail of the LCD screen and brought no thanks good iphone accessories 32 gb

Reviews.Title: Pretty good Iphone
Reviews.Author: michael
Reviews.Content: It should be specified on sale that is blocked in USA phone networks!In rest I am very satisfied of it!
